title: Launcher not working
body:
Hi all

My launcher does not load my LOL client login at all. I keep clicking launch but the launch button relights up again I click it again and still nothing happens after clicking yes on EULA. Please help

replies.body:
This problem has happened to me and a few friends a couple of times and there are a few things that you can do to fix it.

The first thing is if you are on a windows PC try to launch the league client with administrator privileges. To do that find the .exe file (commonly located in "C:/Riot Games/League of Legends" with the name "lol.launcher"). Right click on the program and choose "Run as administrator". If the prompt pops up asking you to give it permissions hit yes.

If this does not solve the issue another way that can commonly solve the problem is to make sure that you don't have any anti virus programs running or any other programs that scan your computer/create firewalls. These can be programs such as Windows Defender, Malware Antibytes or Avast. 

If these two solutions don't work you can always try repairing your client or submitting a support ticket at: http://support.riotgames.com/ There are also Wrenchmen that are around on these boards that I am sure will be able to help you as well. Let me know if the solutions that I have recommended work and if you have any questions let me know and I will try to answer the best I can!

~Elam
Still happening can someone help please
if anyone finds a current solution, please share
